definitions.definition: A perfumed ointment , extracted from the plant Nardostachys jatamansi that belongs to the Valerian family and grows in the Himalayas.
The plant Nardostachys jatamansi (syn. Nardostachys grandiflora ).
Lavandula stoechas , another species used in antiquity to produce an aromatic oil.
Any plant of the genus Aralia of the Araliaceae family.
False spikenard ( Maianthemum racemosum , syn. Smilacina racemosa )
Ploughman's spikenard ( Inula conyza , now Pentanema conyzae ).

main_definition: A perfumed ointment , extracted from the plant Nardostachys jatamansi that belongs to the Valerian family and grows in the Himalayas.
secondary_definitions: The plant Nardostachys jatamansi (syn. Nardostachys grandiflora ).
Lavandula stoechas , another species used in antiquity to produce an aromatic oil.
Any plant of the genus Aralia of the Araliaceae family.
False spikenard ( Maianthemum racemosum , syn. Smilacina racemosa )
Ploughman's spikenard ( Inula conyza , now Pentanema conyzae ).
